channel.title: Client Run Error! Need Help!
channel.description:
Hey guys, I get this error when I run a client that DOESN'T have a J frame, yet I restored this computer less that a week a go. Its same on all three of my computers, all three have the latest JDK, Java, and have variables set up. I think JDK is causing this, but I'm not sure.It works fine for friends. Here is the error:
[CODE]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Gui Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Gui at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Gui. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/CODE]
I'm sure it has a GUI.class and this client is CLOSED-source. Its for all clients I run, deltascape, ddspeced, etc.. I have two options:
-Add a J-Frame -Uninstall JDK and remove variables
I definitely won't do the second one, or at least not on this computer, since I host a server. I tried adding a J-frame but I got errors, and I couldn't think of any way to fix them.
[u][b]So can anyone help me fix this. If you could AT LEAST add J-frame to a client like DeltaScape and link it to me that would be good enough![/b][/u]

item.title: Client Run Error! Need Help!
item.dc:creator: @Eurolite Eurolite
item.description:
@Eurolite wrote:

I cans ee that. I need someone to add a jframe onto this client…

Read full topic

item.title: Client Run Error! Need Help!
item.dc:creator: @Eurolite Eurolite
item.description:
@Eurolite wrote:

Hey guys, I get this error when I run a client that DOESN’T have a J frame, yet I restored this computer less that a week a go. Its same on all three of my computers, all three have the latest JDK, Java, and have variables set up. I think JDK is causing this, but I’m not sure.It works fine for friends. Here is the error:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Gui Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Gui at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Gui. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

I’m sure it has a GUI.class and this client is CLOSED-source. Its for all clients I run, deltascape, ddspeced, etc… I have two options:

-Add a J-Frame
-Uninstall JDK and remove variables

I definitely won’t do the second one, or at least not on this computer, since I host a server. I tried adding a J-frame but I got errors, and I couldn’t think of any way to fix them.

So can anyone help me fix this. If you could AT LEAST add J-frame to a client like DeltaScape and link it to me that would be good enough!
